generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Inspect Bookshelf Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to inspect bookshelves.

fields.title: Goal Radius
fields.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

fields.title: Search Count
fields.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: The height that the mob will search for bookshelves.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: The distance in blocks the mob will look for books to inspect.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this goal.
